original_text: Only you, the nation of Israel, have heard the voice of God that spoke to you from the middle of the fire. Only you have heard God speak and you still live!
korean_text: 어떤 국민이 불 가운데에서 말씀하시는 하나님의 음성을 너처럼 듣고 생존하였느냐

sentences.original_text: Only you, the nation of Israel,
have heard the voice of God
from the middle of the fire.
Only you have heard God speak
sentences.korean_translation: 오직 너희만이 하나님이 말씀하시는 것을 들었고
